Package com.purnendu.quizo.dao

Interface QuestionDao

public interface QuestionDao
This interface handles the data access object (DAO) for question-related operations, focusing on managing Question entities. It utilizes Room Persistence Library annotations including Dao, Insert, Delete, Query, and specifies conflict resolution strategies via OnConflictStrategy. It also interacts with standard Java collections like List.
Version:
2.0.1
Author:
Purnendu Guha

  • Method Details

    • insertQuestion

      long insertQuestion(Question question)
      Inserts a new Question into the database. If a conflict occurs (e.g., a question with the same primary key already exists), the existing question will be replaced with the new one.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to insert.
      Returns:
      The row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred.

    • getRandomQuestionsByTopic

      List<Question> getRandomQuestionsByTopic(String topic)
      Retrieves a random set of Question objects for a specific topic. The questions are ordered randomly using `ORDER BY RANDOM()`.
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic of the questions to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A List of randomly ordered Question objects.

    • getQuestionsByTopic

      List<Question> getQuestionsByTopic(String topic)
      Retrieves all Question objects for a specific topic. The order of questions is not guaranteed.
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic of the questions to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A List of Question objects for the given topic.

    • getQuestionCountByTopic

      int getQuestionCountByTopic(String topic)
      Retrieves the count of questions for a specific topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - The topic for which to count questions.
      Returns:
      The number of questions associated with the given topic.

    • getDistinctTopics

      List<String> getDistinctTopics()
      Retrieves a list of all distinct topics present in the 'questions' table.
      Returns:
      A List of unique topic strings.

    • deleteQuestion

      int deleteQuestion(Question question)
      Deletes a Question from the database. The question is identified by its primary key.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to delete.
      Returns:
      The number of rows deleted.
